title: MSCSE.19
text: The student will systematically identify and correct problems with computing devices and their components.

title: MSCSE.20

title: MSCSE.24
text: The student will recommend improvements to the design of computing devices, based on an analysis of how users interact with the devices.

title: MSCSE.25
